Enums/BoseGestureType.html#/s:11BoseGest.name: all
Enums/BoseGestureType.html#/s:11BoseGest.abstract: The set of gestures supported by the SDK. See WearableDeviceInformation.availableGestures and GestureInformation.availableGestures for the set of gestures supported by a given wearable device.

Enums.html#/s:11BoseGesture0aB5ErrorO.name: BoseGestureError
Enums.html#/s:11BoseGesture0aB5ErrorO.abstract: Unified error type for the Bose Gesture library.

Enums/BoseGestureType.html.name: BoseGestureType
Enums/BoseGestureType.html.abstract: Identifies a gesture recognized by a wearable device.

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.name: enabledGestures
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.abstract: Set of gestures that will be detected by the library. It defaults to all available gestures.

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.name: gestureDataCallback
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.abstract: This will get called with a gesture —if any is detected—.

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.name: startDetectingGestures(timeout:gestureCallback:)
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.abstract: Starts recognizing gestures. Optionally it can automatically stop recognizing after a given time interval.

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.name: stopDetectingGestures()
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.abstract: It stops detecting gestures and invalidates the previously set timer and callback

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.name: appendAccelerometer(data:accuracy:timestamp:)
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.abstract: Call this function to feed accelerometer data into the gesture recognizer.

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.name: appendGyroscope(data:accuracy:timestamp:)
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.abstract: Call this function to feed gyroscope data into the gesture recognizer.

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.name: flush()
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11.abstract: Clear any history of or pertaining to sensor data

Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.name: recognizer
Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.abstract: The gesture recognizer. This object is in charge of predicting gestures usin sensor data as input.

Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.name: configure(analyticsOn:)
Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.abstract: Configures the BoseGesture library. Note this function can only be called once. Subsequent calls will result in a fatal error.

Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.name: shared
Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.abstract: The shared singleton BoseGesture instance. Note that the BoseGesture.configure(withKey:) method must be called first in order to use the BoseGesture.shared instance.

Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.name: releaseVersion
Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.abstract: The release version of the BoseGesture framework. This corresponds to the CFBundleShortVersionString key in the framework’s Info.plist.

Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.name: buildNumber
Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.abstract: The build number of the BoseGesture framework. This corresponds to the CFBundleVersion key in the framework’s Info.plist.

Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.name: formattedVersion
Classes/BoseGesture.html#/s:11BoseGestur.abstract: The formatted version of the BoseGesture framework, combining the release version and build number.

Classes/BoseGesture.html.name: BoseGesture
Classes/BoseGesture.html.abstract: Top-level interface to the BoseGesture library. Note that you must call BoseGesture.configure(withKey:) with a valid API key before using the BoseGesture.shared singleton instance.

Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html.name: BoseGestureRecognizer
Classes/BoseGestureRecognizer.html.abstract: Base Gesture recognizer class, common to specific recognizer implementations.
